rsslib.help:
RSS feed
  • !getrss - get latest RSS message.
  • !subrss - subscribe to the RSS feed. *for server registered users
  • !unsubrss - unsubscribe from the RSS feed. *for server registered users
  • !setrss {url} - set RSS url.
  • !stoprss - stop monitoring of the RSS feed.
  • !startrss - start monitoring of the RSS feed.
